quarkninja.mode.xqmode
Class ErrorBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  quarkninja.mode.xqmode.ErrorBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ErrorBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The bar on the left of the text area whih displays all errors as dots.

Current idea: All errors of a sketch are drawn on the bar, clikcing on one, scrolls to the tab and location. Red dot not in sync with the error line. Similar to eclipse's right error bar which displays the overall errors in a document

Author:
Manindra Moharana
